message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, even at that price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand your position, my maximum budget remains at $8,000. Could we perhaps find a middle ground?
